message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?

I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?

I understand that $110 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $105 is still a bit above what I'm comfortable paying. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?

I understand that $105 was still a bit high for you, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $102. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I'm not sure if I want to go any higher than $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm starting to think it's not worth more than that. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $95?
